mechanics.condition: Choose a creature you can see within range
mechanics.outcome: Target is mystically marked as your quarry until spell ends

mechanics.condition: Target is marked by Hunter's Mark
mechanics.outcome: Deal an extra 1d6 damage to the target

mechanics.trigger: Making a Wisdom (Perception) or Wisdom (Survival) check
mechanics.condition: Check is made to find the creature marked by Hunter's Mark

mechanics.trigger: Marked target drops to 0 hit points
mechanics.condition: Hunter's Mark spell is still active
mechanics.outcome: Can use a bonus action on a subsequent turn to mark a new creature

description_text: You choose a creature you can see within range and mystically mark it as your quarry. Until the spell ends, you deal an extra 1d6 damage to the target whenever you hit it with a weapon attack, and you have advantage on any Wisdom (Perception) or Wisdom (Survival) check you make to find it. If the target drops to 0 hit points before this spell ends, you can use a bonus action on a subsequent turn of yours to mark a new creature.
